explains: n. 雨衣；骗子；[机][皮革] 刮刀
wordGroup: city slicker n. [美口]时髦或世故的城市人

sentences.en: Cracked rain slicker on the hook by the door.
sentences.cn: 挂在门后钩子上的破旧的油布雨衣。

sentences.en: As nice as working with attributes is, XmlParser offers even slicker support for dealing with elements.
sentences.cn: 与操作属性相类似，XmlParser为处理元素提供了更好的支持。

sentences.en: Your HTML and CSS skills can help you build a build a slicker-looking application than my commonActors demo.
sentences.cn: 您的 HTML 和 CSS 技能可以帮助您构建一个比我的 commonActors 外观更光鲜的应用程序。
